Package mcp.mobius.waila.api

Interface ITooltip

@ClientOnly @NonExtendable public interface ITooltip
The tooltip object that Waila will show.

    • getLineCount

    • getLine

      ITooltipLine getLine(int index)
      Returns the line on this index.

      Note: position dependant, you can't access head tooltip in appendBody. To access all tooltip, use IEventListener.onHandleTooltip(mcp.mobius.waila.api.ITooltip, mcp.mobius.waila.api.ICommonAccessor, mcp.mobius.waila.api.IPluginConfig).
